spdfcore.stanalys

Class InconsistencyProof

  • java.lang.Object
    • spdfcore.stanalys.InconsistencyProof

  • public class InconsistencyProof
extends java.lang.Object
    Diagnostics of inconsistent undirected cycles when solving the balance equations.

      • getCycle

        public java.util.LinkedList<Channel> getCycle()

      • getOutToInRatio

        public Fraction getOutToInRatio()
        mismathed factors in the cycle: "OUT" to "IN" ratio of a (rather arbitrary) 'reference channel'

      • findBadCycle

        public boolean findBadCycle(Solutions.Data data)
        Check the channels we did not visit. For them the balance equations should hold too. Otherwise the rates are inconsistent, there is at least one undirected cycle with inconsistent rates. If such cycles exists, fill it into the cycle field so that we can report this error to the designer.
        Returns:
        true if bad cycle was found

      • findCycle

        private void findCycle(Channel refChannel,
             Solutions.Data data)
        given the channel where inconsistency was detected, expose the complete cyclic path with inconsistency by combining this channel with the paths which were followed by the solver when trying to derive the solution.

      • pathToStart

        private static java.util.LinkedList<Channel> pathToStart(Actor actor,
                                        Solutions.Data data)
        Parameters:
        actor - - where to start from
        data - - solver data
        Returns:
        the undirected path from actor to start actor using the 'history' of deriving the fractional solutions, recorded by the solver in 'data'.

      • diagnostics

        public java.lang.String diagnostics()
